section.title: What is the Domain Management Tool?
section.para: The oVirt Engine authenticates users using directory services. Adding and removing users from the system requires the admin user to add the directory service relevant to the user.

The directory services supported by oVirt are Active Directory and IPA. The oVirt Engine includes a domain management tool, engine-manage-domains, to add and remove domains provided by these services.
The engine-manage-domains command is only accessible on the client machine on which the oVirt Engine is installed. The engine-manage-domains command must be run as the root user.
